src:
坐副駕完全不睡　江宏傑開車福原愛忙餵食
07 Nov 2019, 10:20 by 陳于嬙
江宏傑、福原愛夫妻檔攜手代言TOYOTA SIENTA新車，兩人一起拍廣告，靈感來自福原愛小時候參加桌球比賽的場景，劇情是小小愛因發球不順而落淚，奔向媽媽尋求安慰，福原愛看到場設，驚呼：「場景、演員跟氛圍都跟當年去比賽時一模一樣，好像穿越到小時候。」
廣告中一幕夫妻倆送女兒上幼稚園的第一天，回想到之後就要面對，江宏傑與福原愛都相當激動，福原愛更說：「我覺得我一定會馬上哭。」雖然代言車子，福原愛還沒考上駕照，她說：「一方面是當媽媽了，也覺得自己開車很酷，但我個性不敢轉彎，怕旁邊有摩托車。」
回想起兩人世界，福原愛透露江宏傑經常載她去台南、墾丁約會，她在副駕駛座忙著遞食物、礦泉水給江宏傑吃，完全不會睡覺，福原愛說：「可能以前我哥開車，會一直叫我拿東西、咖啡養成習慣。坐小傑的車，我就變成DJ，一直選歌播放。」　
更新時間｜2019.11.07 10:28
text:
Sitting on the co-driver does not sleep at all. Jiang Hongjie drove Fuyuan love to feed
07 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Chen Yuxi
Jiang Hongjie and Fukuhara love husband and wife together to endorse TOYOTA SIENTA new car, the two together to advertise, inspired by Fukuhara love to participate in the table tennis game when the child, the plot is a little love because the tee is not smooth and tears, rushing to the mother to seek comfort, Fukuhara love to see Arrived at the venue, exclaimed: "The scene, the actors and the atmosphere are exactly the same as when they went to the game that year, as if they passed through childhood."
In the first day of the advertisement, the couple sent their daughters to the kindergarten. When they came back to think of it, Jiang Hongjie and Fukuhara Ai were very excited. Fukuhara love said: "I think I will cry immediately." Although the endorsement car, Fukuhara Love has not yet been admitted to the driver's license, she said: "On the one hand is a mother, but also feel that driving is cool, but I do not dare to turn around, afraid of motorcycles next to them."
Recalling the world of two people, Fukuhara Ai revealed that Jiang Hongjie often took her to Tainan and Kenting for a date. She was busy delivering food and mineral water to Jiang Hongjie in the passenger seat. She would not sleep at all. Fukuhara love said: "Maybe my brother drove before. I will always ask me to get things and coffee to get into the habit. When I am in Xiaojie's car, I will become a DJ and keep playing the song."
Update time |2019.11.07 10:28
